title: Why does Braum have Kennen's passive?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
This has been the case as long as i can remember, (god knows why it isn't fixed)

but in the 'buffs affecting your champion' section, it shows Kennen's old passive where Braum's should be, and when you hover over the Icon, it IS indeed the effect Braum's passive... so why does it have Kennen's old passive icon instead of Braum's?
